Metadata: California Sea Grant News (Spring 2011): Coastal Science Serving California

Includes articles on: Far fewer Great White sharks than scientists expected; Coho Salmon Runs Improve in Russian River; NOAA Sea Grant awards $394,000 to Breed a Bigger, Better Pacific Oyster; Habitat Maps of Humboldt Bay Available (New digital images of Humboldt Bay and Eel River); Sea Slugs as Brilliant Indicators of Climate Change; Wave Power: Surf's up and the lights are on!; Tracking the physics of an algal bloom.
